title: Home > Divisions > Personnel and Establishment Division > Establishment V
content: Home > Divisions > Personnel and Establishment Division > Establishment V

title: Establishment V - Point 1
content: Financial concurrence in policy matters relating to retirement benefits to the employees of Central Government and Autonomous Bodies in respect of CCS (Pension) Rules, 1972 and NPS.

title: Establishment V - Point 2
content: Financial concurrence in policy matters relating to GPF and CPF.

title: Establishment V - Point 3
content: Financial concurrence in policy matters relating to age of retirement.

title: Establishment V - Point 4
content: Financial concurrence in policy matters relating to CGHS/CS (MA) Rules.

title: Establishment V - Point 5
content: Financial concurrence in policy matters relating to leave rules.

title: Establishment V - Point 6
content: Financial concurrence in Service condition of CPSE’s employees including VRS/VSS proposals.

title: Establishment V - Point 7
content: Administration and review of Central Government Employees Group Insurance Scheme.
